name: Keybr Dark Colors
description:
Applies their dark theme to the entire site. 

That way when you switch to your profile to view your stats you're not blinded by the light theme after having used the dark theme while practicing!
css:
@-moz-document domain(keybr.com) {
@media
all and
(-ms-high-contrast:none),(-ms-high-contrast:active){html{width:100%;height:100%}}body{margin:0;padding:0}[hidden],template{display:none}main{display:block}textarea{resize:vertical}small{font-size:80%}big{font-size:120%}a{font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;color:#698EB1}h1,h2,h3,p{font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-align:left;text-decoration:none}h1{margin:1rem
